summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CourseCRM extended features - all core and extended features working correctly

minor_issues.issue: Modal overlay blocks button clicks, requires force=True in automation

passed_tests: Admin login with admin@crm.local / admin123
Dashboard loads with all stats cards and manager statistics table (admin only)
Dashboard shows overdue reminders alert when applicable
Language switcher works (UZ/RU) in both header and settings
Create client and verify it appears in list
Client detail page - add note/comment functionality
Client detail page - add reminder with date/time
Client detail page - add payment with USD currency support
Client detail page - archive and restore client functionality
Clients page - export to CSV button works
Clients page - toggle archived view functionality
Settings page - status management (add custom status) - admin only
Activity log page shows recent actions with filtering (admin only)
Mobile responsive layout - sidebar toggle and navigation
All extended backend API endpoints (23/23 tests passed)
Reminder system - create, update, complete, delete reminders
Custom status management - create, update, delete custom statuses
Archive/restore clients functionality
CSV export functionality working
Activity log with entity filtering
Manager statistics dashboard (admin only)
USD currency support in payments
Mobile responsive UI with hamburger menu navigation
Audio file upload functionality (backend API tested)
